title: order missions bug?
body: for some reason after completing the "the light rises" mission i have not received any more missions is this normal and am I not the only one with this bug

replies.body: If you've completed your missions for the day, there will be more- but not right away.  You should see new missions refresh around 11:00am Pacific time across all regions.  Hang tight!
i have the same problem and it's been two days since the last missions :(
Daily Missions, you can only complete a certain amount each day but will refresh at about 11:00am Pacific
That's such bullshit i was looking Forward to do some missions and earn These "credits" to craft some shit but no...there are no missions :( :( WHY RIOT WHYYYYY?!?! XD
